# cook your dish here
try:
    t = int(input())
    for _ in range(t):
        p = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
        q = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
        
        q[1] *= -1
        m = (q[1]-p[1])/(q[0]-p[0])
        c = p[1] - m*p[0]
        
        print("{:.2f}".format(-c/m))
except:
    pass

#cook you dish here
t=int(input())
l=[]
for i in range(t):
    x1,y1=list(map(int,input().split()))
    x2,y2=list(map(int,input().split()))
    x=(x1*y2+x2*y1)/(y1+y2)
    l.append(x)
for i in l:
    print(i)

# cook your dish here
t=int(input())
while(t>0):
    x1,y1=input().split()
    x2,y2=input().split()
    x1=int(x1)
    x2=int(x2)
    y1=int(y1)
    y2=int(y2)
    x=min(x1,x2)
    if x==x1:
        ans=(y1*(x2-x1))/(y1+y2)
        ans=x1+ans
    else:
        ans=(y2*(x1-x2))/(y1+y2)
        ans=x2+ans
    print('%.2f'%ans)
    
    t=t-1

for _ in range(int(input())):
	x1,y1=list(map(int,input().split()))
	x2,y2=list(map(int,input().split()))	
	m=(y2-(-y1))/(x2-x1)
	y=y2
	x=x2
	c=y-(m*x)

	y=0
	x=(y-c)/m
	print("{:.2f}".format(x))

n=int(input())
for i in range(n):
    x1,y1=map(int,input().split())
    x2,y2=map(int,input().split())
    if(x1>x2):
        t=x1
        x1=x2
        x2=t
        t1=y1
        y1=y2
        y2=t1
    r=y1*(x2-x1)
    r1=r/(y2+y1)
    print(x1+r1)
